archimate:TechnologyService.name: Overlord Management Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Check configuration https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#dynamic-configuration GET /druid/indexer/v1/worker GET /druid/indexer/v1/worker/history?interval={interval}&counter={count} GET /druid/indexer/v1/scaling
Set configuration https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#dynamic-configuration POST /druid/indexer/v1/worker https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/configuration/index.html#overlord-dynamic-configuration
